Articles.Content: Floor 25: an office with cows instead of worker
Floor 26: Butchers quickly run downstairs, and you hear screaming...
Floor 27: There are monitors everywhere and a man stares into your soul with his souless eyes.
floor 28: Sunshine lollipops and rainbows everywhere!
29: Dozens of portraits of SCPs. The largest ones are SCP-173 and SCP-106.
You scream up to Floor 30. You find the actual rooms those SCPS are in.
Floor 31: Under the launch pad where Apollo 11 is lifting off
Floor 32: There is a large hole in the floor were Apollo 11 came crashing through.
Floor 33: The Saturn V is now lodged in the ceiling.
Floor 34: You see parts of the LM on the floor. A kerbal goes out and says something in Kerbal language, which appears to you happy.
Floor 35: Coffee shops that don't sell coffee.

Floor 36: Coffee bean farms, where everything is operated by a dysfunctional team of cyborg Kerbals, thus the lack of coffee on floor 35.

Edited June 28, 2013 by OrbitusII
one sentence rule
Floor 37: A coffee bean farm operated by a dysfunctional team of cyborg Kerbals, but there are no dysfunctional cyborg Kerbals and no coffee bean farm.
floor 38: fascinated looking kerbals studying a dancing narwhal

Floor 39: A nuke is headed for downstairs to destroy the confusion, but thankfully it's a very, very small nuke.

Edited June 28, 2013 by The Jedi Master
numbers
Floor 40: An Unobtanium refinery
Floor 41: A blacksmith that uses the Unobtanium.
Floor 42: This floor is the meaning of life, the universe and everything!
Floor 43: A sign saying that the floor caved in to floor 42 making it inaccessible.
Floor 44: a computer with the old thread with this game on it! and a tiger eating your face.
Floor 45: A TV with Top Gear and nothing else sits in the middle of the room.
Floor 46: a magical crystal which will answer you one question about the universe! ask it a question before preceding up the stairs, it will give you it's answer on a higher floor.
Floor 47: The Lunar Room, it has a sign saying "CAUTION! DO NOT: Shoot a portal on the surface. Go in."
48: Another magical crystal is in this room, it gives you the answer 42!
49: a huge encyclopedic looking book the size of a kitchen table labeled "Organic semiconductors, reproduction logic gates, and magrathean mass fabricators for dummies"
